int fastint ( ) { int r = 0 ; char c = getchar ( ) ; while ( c == '
' || c == ' ' ) c = getchar ( ) ; while ( c != '
' && c != ' ' ) { r = ( r * 10 ) + ( c - '0' ) ; c = getchar ( ) ; } return r ; } void getTriangle ( int buffer [ 100 ] [ 100 ] , int limit ) { int i , j ; for ( i = 0 ; i <= limit ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j < i ; j ++ ) buffer [ i ] [ j ] = fastint ( ) ; } } void printTriangle ( int buffer [ 100 ] [ 100 ] , int limit ) { int i , j ; for ( i = 0 ; i <= limit ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j < i ; j ++ ) printf ( "%d " , buffer [ i ] [ j ] ) ; printf ( "
" ) ; } } void zeroTriangle ( int buffer [ 100 ] [ 100 ] , int limit ) { int i , j ; for ( i = 0 ; i <= limit ; i ++ ) for ( j = 0 ; j < i ; j ++ ) buffer [ i ] [ j ] = 0 ; } int tsum_mr ( int buffer [ 100 ] [ 100 ] , int limit ) { int i , j ; for ( i = limit ; i >= 0 ; i -- ) for ( j = 0 ; j < i ; j ++ ) { buffer [ i - 1 ] [ j ] = max ( ( buffer [ i ] [ j ] + buffer [ i - 1 ] [ j ] ) , ( buffer [ i ] [ j + 1 ] + buffer [ i - 1 ] [ j ] ) ) ; } return buffer [ 1 ] [ 0 ] ; } int main ( ) { int i , j , k ; i = fastint ( ) ; int buffer [ 100 ] [ 100 ] ; while ( i ) { k = fastint ( ) ; getTriangle ( buffer , k ) ; printf ( "%d
" , tsum_mr ( buffer , k ) ) ; i -- ; } return 0 ; }
